params.amountIn: The quantity of fromToken being sent
params.fromToken: The token used for entry (address(0) if ether)
params.maxPrice: The maximum price at which to buy the bond
params.principal: The token fromToken is being converted to (i.e. token or LP to bond)
params.swapTarget: Excecution target for the swap or Zap

params.amountIn: The quantity of fromToken being sent
params.fromToken: The token used for entry (address(0) if ether)
params.minToToken: The minimum acceptable quantity sOHM or gOHM to receive. Reverts otherwise
params.toToken: The token fromToken is being converted to (i.e. sOHM or gOHM)

returns.OHMRec: The quantity of sOHM or gOHM received (depending on toToken)

params.tokens: An array of the tokens to withdraw (0xeee address if ETH)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setApprovedTargets(address[],bool[]).details: Adds or removes an approved swapTarget swapTargets should be Zaps and must not be tokens!

params.targets: An array of addresses of approved swapTargets

params.zapAddress: The Zap caller which is allowed to bypass fees (if > 0)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.tokens: An array of the tokens to withdraw (0xeee address if ETH)

ZapBond(address,uint256,address,address,.notice: This function acquires Olympus bonds with ETH or ERC20 tokens

ZapStake(address,uint256,address,uint256.notice: This function acquires OHM with ETH or ERC20 tokens and stakes it for sOHM/gOHM

affilliateWithdraw(address[]).notice: Withdraws the affilliate share, retaining goodwill share

set_feeWhitelist(address,bool).notice: Set address to true to bypass fees when calling this contract

set_new_affiliateSplit(uint256).notice: Sets the percentage to split the goodwill by to distribute to affiliates

withdrawTokens(address[]).notice: Withdraws goodwill share, retaining affilliate share
